title: Workplace Hazards - People, Electricity, Work Equipment & Vehicles
headline: Learn about the twelve common workplace hazards and the ways to manage them in this free online course.
description: This course is designed for any workplace organizer, manager or supervisor to help them deal with common hazards in the working environment. Throughout this course, you will learn how to effectively identify and manage four common workplace hazards to keep employees safe. You will also come across different statistics that will tell you how frequently some of these hazards occur in the workplace. Enroll today!
courseDescription:
Every year, thousands of accidents occur in workplaces around the world. Not only do these incidents cost human lives but they also are a source of increasing workplace expenses. Most of these accidents occur because of a lack of proper knowledge regarding identifying common hazards or their improper management. These problems exist at the employees' level and the workplace's upper management. Keeping this in mind, the experts at Exoexcellence Consultants have designed this comprehensive course on common workplace hazards.

This course aims to benefit the workplace's managers, supervisors and employees equally. We therefore provide you with adequate knowledge required to identify and manage the four common workplace hazards: fall hazards, electrical hazards, hazards from vehicles and hazards from machines. The entire course consists of a single module that will disclose key points in identifying common workplace hazards and explore adequate strategies for managing them.

Throughout the course, various statistics and infographics will provide a deeper understanding of the prevalence of these workplace hazards. The topic also presents tables that will make it easy for you to associate risks with standard workplace equipment. After completing this course, you can apply the skills gained in identifying and managing the workplace hazards related to your colleagues, electricity and work equipment.
